name: Dinosaur Hunting Survival 3D
description:
Dinosaur Hunting Survival 3D is really a thrilling and best adventure game with multiple thrilling and deadly heavy weapons. There are different types of real dinosaurs try to kill you and want to destroy global peace if you are thinking that you are the best sniper and an ultimate shooter with multiple shooting skills then consider yourself a jungle animal killer to prevent this world from such deadliest monsters an show your shooting skills.


Dinosaur Hunting Survival 3D: Features

surgical map to follow the monsters
best graphical 3d jungle environment
Multiple no.of dinosaurs to shot
Kill before they attack you
Be the Best shooter/ sniper
Multi-levels game
